title: Software Engineer NEW!
full_description: Software Engineers work to design, develop, test, deploy and support Arrivos software and related systems in a team focused environment. Must possess strong analytical skill to understand business requirements and program accordingly. The culmination of skills technique, experience, and teamwork will be utilized in supporting a collaborative work environment between users, team members, and business partners.Software Engineer Major Job Functions:Work closely with business analystAssist testing and documentation teamsWork in a collaborative team environmentContinuous self-improvement through ongoing education, training and self-directed learning and improvementFollow accepted project methodologyDevelop and demonstrate a thorough knowledge of the Companyâ€™s business operationsAdditional Desired Qualifications:Excellent understanding of software design and programming principles.A team player with excellent communication skillsAnalytical thinking and problem-solving capabilityGreat attention to detail and time-management skills
